summary: REQ-37 appears implemented: the unauthenticated label in LoginButton is changed to "Admin Login" while keeping "Logout" and "Logging in...". However, two additional files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) that were not requested for this text-only UI change.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the unauthenticated login button label in frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton.tsx and explicitly stated not to change other copy; no requirement mentioned updating summary/metadata files.
BuildRequest did not request any project state/schema/version summary updates; this goes beyond the specified text-only UI label change.
